proposal: Diving into the world of AI-powered cloud security, OpSync stands out with its self-sufficient ecosystem, from GPUs to Node rentals, all under one roof - no third-party headaches. With 35 holders in the ETH network, it's clear the community is tuning in. Imagine integrating our DEX or Lottery tools, where anyone can contribute to OpSync's vision while sharing in the revenue. A perfect match? Let's secure the future, together.
